name: Armateurs de France
goal:
Armateurs de France represents the French maritime transport et services companies. Our trade association :
- represents and defends the interests of its members,
- represents them towards the French, European and international institutions,
- is in charge of the communication and the image of shipping,
- is an employers association, in charge of bargaining agreements,
- informs and advises its members.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Shipping policy, competition, environment and climate change, passengers rights, liabiilty of carriers, maritime safety and security, taxation.
